newsitem.title: USA: Most IMM currency futures close sharply lower.
newsitem.headline: Most IMM currency futures close sharply lower.

text.p: April 4 - Most IMM currency futures closed sharply lower in light trade. June marks and Swiss francs ended near the day's lows, but held above Thursday's overall low. Traders said Fed vice chair Rivlin's comments dragged down most currencies. June yen set a contract low of $0.008127, while June Can dollars dipped to the overnight low of $0.7202. ((DerivativesDesk(312)408-8750)) E-mail:derivatives@reuters.com
